android.content.res

Class XResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.res.Resources
      • android.content.res.MiuiResources
        • android.content.res.XResources

  • public class XResources
extends MiuiResources
    Resources class that allows replacements for selected resources

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  XResources.DrawableLoader
      callback function for getDrawable(int) and getDrawableForDensity(int, int)
      static class  XResources.ResourceNames 
      class  XResources.XTypedArray
      TypedArray replacement that replaces values on-the-fly.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.res.Resources

        android.content.res.Resources.NotFoundException, android.content.res.Resources.Theme

      • hookLayout

        public XC_LayoutInflated.Unhook hookLayout(java.lang.String fullName,
                                  XC_LayoutInflated callback)
        See Also:
        hookLayout(String, String, String, XC_LayoutInflated)

      • hookLayout

        public XC_LayoutInflated.Unhook hookLayout(java.lang.String pkg,
                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  XC_LayoutInflated callback)
        Add a function to be called once a specific layout has been inflated.
        Parameters:
        pkg - Package, e.g. com.android.systemui
        type - Type (in this case always layout)
        name - Name of the resource (e.g. statusbar)
        callback - Handler to be called
